    • Constructor Detail

      • Dialogue

        public Dialogue​(org.jsfml.graphics.View currentWorld,
                org.jsfml.graphics.Font font,
                org.jsfml.graphics.Texture boardTexture,
                java.lang.String speakingCharacter,
                java.lang.String dialogueText)
        Soul constructor for the dialogue box that appears at the bottom of the screen when interacting with an NPC.
        Parameters:
        currentWorld - sets the current view of the world.
        font - sets the font of the text within the dialogue box.
        boardTexture - sets the texture of the dialogue box background.
        speakingCharacter - sets the header of the dialogue box to the character currently speaking.
        dialogueText - sets the message to be spoken.

    • Method Detail

      • setCharacterName

        Parameters:
        nameToWrite - sets the name displayed in the dialogue box.

      • getTextContent

        public java.lang.String getTextContent()
        Returns:
        the text displayed in the message component of the dialogue box.

      • getCharacterName

        public java.lang.String getCharacterName()
        Uses the special characters in the dialogue to determine who should display as speaking in the dialogue box.
        Returns:
        the character name being displayed within the dialogue box.

      • setOriginalInteractor

        public void setOriginalInteractor​(java.lang.String nameToWrite)
        Parameters:
